displayName.japanese: 射撃オンリー

description.english: Beat a level without using the fly button.
description.russian: Пройти уровень, не используя клавишу полета.
description.french: Réussir un niveau sans jamais utiliser la fonction Saut
description.german: Absolviere einen Level, ohne die Flug-Taste zu benutzen.
description.brazilian: Concluir um nível sem usando o botão de voar
description.spanish: Supera un nivel sin usar el botón de vuelo.
description.italian: Supera un livello senza usare il pulsante di volo.
description.japanese: 飛行ボタンを使用せずにステージをクリア

displayName.japanese: 百転百倒

description.french: Mourir 100 fois dans un même niveau
description.brazilian: Morrer 100 vezes em um nível
description.spanish: Muere 100 veces en un nivel.
description.italian: Muori 100 volte in un livello
description.japanese: 1ステージで100回死亡

displayName.japanese: ガクストの平和主義者

description.french: Aucune scie démontée dans 'Estomac II'
description.italian: Nessuna sega rimossa in "Stomaco II"
description.spanish: No muevas ninguna sierra en "Estómago 2".
description.russian: Не сбить ни одной пилы в "Желудке II"
description.japanese: 「胃袋II」でノコギリを一切除去しない
description.brazilian: Nenhuma serra deslocada em “Estômago II”

displayName.japanese: エクリプシーズの平和主義者

description.english: No enemy ships destroyed in 'Target Locked'
description.russian: Не уничтожить ни одного вражеского корабля в "Цель выбрана"
description.french: Aucun vaisseau ennemi détruit dans 'Cible verrouillée'
description.german: Keine zerstörten gegnerische Schiffe in ‚Ziel erfasst‘
description.brazilian: Nenhuma nave inimiga destruída em “Alvo Travado”
description.spanish: No destruyas ningún enemigo en "Objetivo bloqueado".
description.italian: Nessuna nave nemica distrutta in "Obiettivo agganciato"
description.japanese: 「ターゲット・ロックオン」で敵船を一切破壊しない

displayName.japanese: マリシャスの平和主義者

description.french: Aucun vaisseau ennemi endommagé dans "Grille-de-fer"
description.italian: Nessuna nave nemica danneggiata in "Griglia"
description.spanish: No dañes ninguna nave en "Parrilla de hierro".
description.russian: Не повредить ни одного вражеского корабля на "Решетка"
description.japanese: 「グリディロン」で敵船を一切傷つけない
description.brazilian: Nenhuma nave inimiga danificada em “Gridiron”

displayName.japanese: ゴール！

description.english: Shoot the saw through the two large chambers and live to tell about it in 'Football Racetrack'
description.russian: Прострелить пилой 2 больших зала и выжить в "Футбольных гонках"
description.french: Dans 'Exploit footballistique', envoyer la scie à travers les deux grandes salles et survivre pour pouvoir le raconter.
description.german: Schieße die Säge durch die zwei großen Kammern und überlebe es in ‚Fußball-Rennstrecke‘
description.brazilian: Atirar na serra que passa pelas duas câmaras grandes e viver para contar a história em “Pista de Futebol”
description.spanish: Lanza la sierra a lo largo de dos grandes habitaciones y vive para contarlo en "Circuito de carreras futbolístico".
description.italian: Tira la sega oltre le due grandi camere e sopravvivi in "Pista da calcio"
description.japanese: 「フットボールレース場」でノコギリを撃ち続け2つの大部屋を通過させた上で、生還する

displayName.japanese: デストロイヤー

description.english: No mercy for turrets in 'Pew Pew Pew'
description.french: Aucune pitié pour les tourelles dans 'Piouuu Piouuu Piouuu'
description.brazilian: Nada de misericórdia para torres em “Pou pou pou”
description.spanish: No tengas piedad con las torretas en "Pim, pam, pum".
description.italian: Nessuna pietà per le torrette in "Bang bang bang"
description.japanese: 「ピュー・ピュー・ピュー」で砲台を全滅させる
